verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> these <S%H1697>things,<s%> when the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> was <S%H7918>pacified,<s%> he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H2060>Vashti,<s%> and what she had <S%H6213>done,<s%> and what was decreed against <S%H1504>her.<s%>

So it <S%H4428>happened,<s%> when the king's <S%H1697>commandment<s%> and his <S%H1697>decree<s%> was <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and when <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5291>maidens<s%> were gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> to the <S%H1002>citadel<s%> of <S%H7800>Susa,<s%> to the <S%H3027>custody<s%> of <S%H1896>Hegai,<s%> that <S%H635>Esther<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> into the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H3027>custody<s%> of <S%H1896>Hegai,<s%> <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H802>women.<s%>

The <S%H5291>maiden<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5375>him,<s%> and she obtained <S%H2617>kindness<s%> from <S%H6440>him.<s%> He <S%H926>quickly<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> her <S%H8562>cosmetics<s%> and her <S%H4490>portions<s%> of <S%H7200>food,<s%> and the <S%H7651>seven<s%> choice <S%H5291>maidens<s%> who were to be <S%H5414>given<s%> her out of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> He <S%H8138>moved<s%> her and her <S%H5291>maidens<s%> to the <S%H2896>best<s%> place in the <S%H802>women<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

The young <S%H5291>woman<s%> then <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> like <S%H559>this:<s%> whatever she desired was <S%H5414>given<s%> her to <S%H935>go<s%> with her out of the <S%H802>women<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

In the <S%H6153>evening<s%> she <S%H935>went,<s%> and on the next <S%H1242>day<s%> she <S%H7725>returned<s%> into the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H802>women<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H3027>custody<s%> of <S%H8190>Shaashgaz,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5631>eunuch,<s%> who <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H6370>concubines.<s%> She came <S%H935>in<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> no <S%H4428>more,<s%> unless the king <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in <S%H7121>her,<s%> and she was called by <S%H8034>name.<s%>
